author: HikerCZ
title: An ideal freebie?
review:
Call me sentimental but when I first saw the pictures of this promotional set, I knew I had to get it. Unfortunately the only way was either to splash out a lot of money on E-bay or become a Lego shop customer. Which I did, so strong was my desire. 

It was my first free promo set and I have to say it's still my number one. The fountain set is right behind it, but this freebie has everything many regular sets lack. 

First of all it's a full structure. Many Lego sets are only 'lookers' from one angle. Not this one. All angles are pleasant and the proportions are in harmony. It's not minifig scale but when you pose a figure next to it, it's perfectly fine, like a small winter cottage. 

Even though the set is colourful, it's never garish. The attention to detail is astonishing on such a small scale and you can shuffle the tiny decorations to make it look slightly different every year. (I have to remind myself the licorice allsorts is not for eating :-)

The set has very limited playability but I don't see it as a problem. You can use it as a nice storage space for you mini brick-built Christmas presents, a weekend house for you Lego Santa or even use it as a money bank for children. It will also be a nice addition to your Christmas village.

The set came with an extraordinary number of spare parts, sure only 1x1 but still a nice unexpected bonus.

Although with a minifig the set would have been heavenly, it's still perfect and such joy to look at, especially during Christmas time.

author: pinz
title: nice extra at the Christmas shopping
review:
This set was an gift in the Legostore, if you had a total amount above some limit. With 2 kids, easy :-)

 

The set itself is nice and very colourful. The build was easy enough, so that even the 4 year old kid could join. The instructions are easy and the parts are nice. I like this modified bricks, that look like a brick wall (well it is a brick wall after all).

Every year now we put out on display during the seasondays.

If you get hold of one these sets, catch it or if not look the parts up at bricklink, they are not so special, just colorful. 

 

I personally liked this Christmas gift from Lego.
